text: Jeanny Marc (born December 2, 1950 in Deshaies, Guadeloupe) is a member of the National Assembly of France. She represents the Caribbean island of Guadeloupe, and is a member of United Guadeloupe, Solidary and Responsible and sits as part of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche group. ==References== * page on the French National Assembly website Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:People from Deshaies Category:Guadeloupean politicians Category:United Guadeloupe, Solidary and Responsible politicians Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Guadeloupean socialists
title: Jeanny Marc
